projects.title: Battery Health Estimation
projects.bodyText: Built a system to estimate battery health and proactively alert users before the battery reaches critical levels, optimizing device reliability and user experience.

projects.title: IBM Web Phishing Detection
projects.bodyText: Developed a phishing detection system to identify and block spam and fraudulent links, enhancing web security and user protection.

projects.title: Car Marketplace
projects.bodyText: Built an online car marketplace platform enabling users to seamlessly buy, sell, and browse vehicles with secure and efficient features.

projects.title: Vehicle Management System
projects.bodyText: Developed a vehicle management system for parking lots to streamline entry, exit, and slot allocation while improving efficiency and security.

projects.title: Crowd Funding
projects.bodyText: Built a crowdfunding platform enabling users to create, manage, and support fundraising campaigns with secure payment integration.

projects.title: Fleximail_Agent
projects.bodyText: Created a browser and email extension that intelligently manages, filters, and prioritizes emails to enhance user productivity.
